body.name: OBO N60C+H36 Carbon Fiber Tripod with 360° Swivel Damping Ball Head for Digital DSLR Camera
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Tripod Feature】: This tripod has the features of lightweight, strong bearing capacity and good quality. It has a center column with a concave triangle design, so its storage is very compact. The folded length is only 486mm, and the bottom of the center column is also equipped with a heavy spring hook, which can hang some heavy stuff for you. Besides, it also plays a role in wind protection while hanging heavy objects

【Material Structure】: The tripod is made of 8 layers of carbon fiber, and its surface is smooth and delicate. 8 layers of carbon fiber can provide strong structural organization, making the tripod more reliable and sturdy. There is 1/4” and 3/8” convertible screw on the top of the tray, which can be used to connect ball heads with different screw holes. There is a red knob on the top side of the tripod, loosen the knob to control the center column.

【Tripod Function】: The tripod has 3 angle adjustments (Height, Medium, Low) by pressing the bottom on tripod legs. The detachable center column can be used upside down for macro photography. In addition to the long center column, The tripod is also equipped with a short center column for your replacement. The removable rubber feet on the bottom of the legs can be replaced with metal spikes, and these spikes will come as accessories as well

【Two in One】: The N60C is a 2-in-1 tripod that can also be converted to a monopod. The leg tube with the unlocking indication is a detachable leg tube which can be used as a monopod when disassembled. In addition, it can be used as a trekking pole after connecting the mental spike as well. This tripod is a versatile product

【Ball Head】: The tripod is equipped with a 360°panoramic damping ball head H36. This ball head is a multi-functional ball head with damping adjustment. A damping adjuster is installed on the ball locking knob. The load-bearing of the ball head is excellent with a max load of 15kg. There is a scale mark on the bottom of the ball head, which is convenient for you to splice the panoramic picture. It has 1/4” screw hole at the bottom, which can be connected to most tripods.
body.description: Tripod Parameters：Mateiral: 8 Layers of Carbon FiberMax Height: 64”/160cmMin Height: 15”/38cmFolded Length: 19”/48.6cmWeight: 2.6lbs/1.2kgMax load: 44lbs/20kgSection: 4 sectionsMax Pipe Diameter: 28mmMin Pipe Diameter: 19mmBall Head Parameters: Material: Aluminum AlloyBall Diameter: 36mmHeight: 82mmMax load: 33lbs/15kgDamping Control: YesTripod Features：The features of tripod are lightweight, strong load-capacity and easy operation. The center column design of this tripod is a patented concave triangle design, each concave can be perfectly next to the tripod leg. So the storage of the tripod is rather compact and convenient. The detachable center column can be inverted to use to achieve macro photography The tripod legs have 3 angle adjustments, which can make this tripod fit different terrain and that is able to meet your daily shooting needs. The detachable feet pads can be convertedto mental spikes, these mental spkikes will help you use this tripod more stably on grass or muddy place. The tripod has adopted twist lock design to unfold or fold, the twist lock design has stronger locking force and is more convenient for you to adjust the tripod height.Ball Head Features：Model H36 is a 360° panoramic ball head with damping control, it has excellent load capacity, max load can reach 33lbs. The ball head is quite durable and reliable because of its high-quality aluminum alloy material. This ball head is designed with a single U-shaped notch, which can support you to do some vertical and horizontal shooting. As a panoramic ball head, it has a scale mark on its bottom to help you splice the panoramic picture.Package Includes:1 x Tripod 1 x Ball Head 3 x Metal Spike 3 x Wrench1 x Tripod Bag
